Detailed Description

The class encapsulates various useful XML utilities

static Attribute org::ipdr::utility::XMLUtility::getMandatoryAttribute (  Element  element,
String  attributeName
)  throws ConfigException [inline, static, protected]
 

Returns an instance of Attribute of attribute under given element. If none exist, raises an exception

Parameters:
element The element to retrieve the attribute
attributeName The name of the attribute to retrieve
Returns:
The instance of Attribute
Exceptions:
ConfigException 
00025     {
00026         Attribute result = element.getAttribute(attributeName);
00027         if (result == null)
00028             throw new ConfigException("Mandatory attribute '" + attributeName + "' does not exist for element " + element.getQualifiedName());
00029         return result;
00030     }

Parameters:

Returns:
value of the attribute or defaultValue if the attribute does not exist

DataConversionException

00088         return defaultValue;
